author: andreas
content:
Emma, this is one of the cases where I like using Alien Skin's SnapArt filter. Sometimes I do it to cover up noise, here I did it to put a little color into the image. I know that many people object to it, but that's OK for me ðŸ™‚

Paul, yes, I have a lot of music, and as everyone else I tend to hear a small subset of it. Many things I even forget. This kind of random approach, selecting music for its title, makes me hear some my own forgotten music. In a way it's most of all for me ðŸ™‚
